addGameMaster
description: Add the gameMaster socketId to the game

params.name: socketId
params.description: The id of the gameMaster Socket

name: addPlayer
description: Create a new player and add it to players list

name: howManyPlayers
description: Return how many players are in the game

name: howManyRoles
description: Return how many roles are set

name: addRole
description: addRole is used to create a new Role to have in the current game template

name: addMission
description: addMission store a new mission in the current Game object

params.name: action
params.description: The action which can be done to success the mission

params.name: role
params.description: The Role which the mission is assigned to

name: addAction
description: addAction store an action in the current Game object.

params.name: effect
params.description:
Effect of the action, function with
2 parameters yoFurself:Player and others:[Player]

params.name: affectOthers
params.description: How many other players are affected

name: assignRoles
description: assignRole create players with already connected players in the game

params.name: players
params.description: players infos from the socket io client

name: src/socketio.js

content:
#README
# API

RestAPI pour le projet web 3TC : RPplaner

## tools

 - koa.js
 - koa-router
 - mocha (testing)
 - chai (testing)

### database

 - SQL database
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "api",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "RestAPI for the 3TC-web-project",
  "main": "app.js",
  "directories": {
    "test": "tests"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "eslint . && mocha --require babel-polyfill --require @babel/register ./tests/*.js",
    "dev": "nodemon --exec babel-node ./src/app.js",
    "lint": "eslint ./src",
    "lint-fix": "eslint ./src --fix",
    "clean": "rm -rf build && mkdir build",
    "build-babel": "babel -d ./build ./src -s",
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run build-babel",
    "start": "node ./build/app.js",
    "doc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/RPplanner-Team/API.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "RestAPI"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/RPplanner-Team/API/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/RPplanner-Team/API#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "@koa/cors": "^2.2.3",
    "chai": "^4.2.0",
    "chai-http": "^4.3.0",
    "dotenv": "^8.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "import-modules": "^2.0.0",
    "koa": "^2.11.0",
    "koa-bodyparser": "^4.2.1",
    "koa-router": "^8.0.6",
    "lodash": "^4.17.15",
    "mocha": "^7.0.1",
    "mongoose": "^5.8.11",
    "node-schedule": "^1.3.2",
    "socket.io": "^2.3.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.8.4",
    "@babel/core": "^7.8.4",
    "@babel/node": "^7.8.4",
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.8.4",
    "@babel/register": "^7.8.3",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.3",
    "eslint": "^6.8.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^14.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.20.1",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.2"
  }
}
name: package.json
